Venice 14 December 2022

Here there are input files:
input files: residual.tif and trento1.tif (Lidar DTM from the Province of Trento cartographic service (“Ufficio Sistemi Informativi - Servizio autorizzazioni e valutazioni ambientali”) available at this link:
http://www.territorio.provincia.tn.it/portal/server.pt/community/lidar/847/lidar/23954
These are available with creative common license


Venice 5 August 2024
DEMs cropped for reducing file size
